name: Flowers Curvy Clutch
description:
Portuguese Vintage fabric.

Are you a feminine, confident woman? Are you looking for an elegant, unique bag that expresses your personality? Well, go no further: this clutch is for you!

This handmade, one-of-a-king clutch has the perfect shape for both night an day, dress up or dress down. It won't let you down! 

* High quality 100% cotton, pre-washed fabrics. The outer fabric is a Dutch Oilily print with a great touch; the lining is an adorable red polkadotted print. 
* Fully interfaced with white canvas for sturdiness and durability.
* Two darts in the bottom give this clutch 6 cm (2.4") depth. 
* Closes with one securely attached magnetic snap.
* Measurements are approx. 28 cm (11") wide x 15 cm (5") tall: comfortably fits some cash, a few cards and a lip balm.
* Machine wash at 40ºC.



To see more Angela Santos products, please visit http://www.angelasantos-contemporaneo.blogspot.com click the 'back to site' link at the top of the page.

name: African Curvy Clutch
description:
This fabric came for São Tomé e Príncipe an island located exactly on the equator.Its lush landscapes served as the inspiration for this Batik fabric. Simply beautiful... 


This handmade, one-of-a-king clutch has the perfect shape for both night an day, dress up or dress down. It won't let you down! 

*High quality 100% cotton, pre-washed fabrics. The outer fabric is a American print designed by Anna Griffin for Windham Fabrics; the lining is an adorable red and white polkadotted print.
*Fully interfaced with white canvas for sturdiness and durability.
* Two darts in the bottom give this clutch 6 cm (2.4") depth. 
* Closes with one securely attached magnetic snap.
* Measurements are approx. 28 cm (11") wide x 15 cm (5") tall: comfortably fits some cash, a few cards and a lip balm.
* Machine wash at 40ºC.


To see more Angela Santos products, please visit http://www.angelasantos-contemporaneo.blogspot.com click the 'back to site' link at the top of the page.
